topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Enabling and Disabling Freezer Services

section.p: To stop Freezer globally, launch the following playbook from the deployer (this will stop all freezer-api and all freezer-agent running on your clusters): ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts freezer-stop.yml
To start Freezer globally, launch the following playbook from the deployer: ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts freezer-start.yml
It is possible to target only specific nodes using the ansible --limit parameter.

ol.li:
Run the following command to stop the freezer-agent: sudo systemctl stop freezer-scheduler or run the following commands to start the freezer-agent:
sudo systemctl start freezer-schedulersudo systemctl stop freezer-scheduler

Run the following commands to stop the freezer-api:
sudo a2dissite freezer-modwsgisudo systemctl reload apache2or run the following commands to start the freezer-api: sudo a2ensite freezer-modwsgisudo systemctl reload apache2
